```{r}
library(foreign)
library(sas7bdat)
library(ggplot2)
lab4 <- read.sas7bdat("adult_bmi.sas7bdat", debug=FALSE)
```

Basic scatterplot
```{r}
head(lab4)
p1 <- ggplot(data=lab4, aes(x=bmi, y=weight7))
p1 <- p1 + geom_point()
p1
```
